dataset.title: Leicestershire and Rutland Environmental Records Centre records 2015-2019

creator.organizationName: Leicestershire and Rutland Environmental Records Centre

metadataProvider.organizationName: Leicestershire and Rutland Environmental Records Centre

address.deliveryPoint: Unit F, 14 - 18 St Mary's Gate, Lace Market

abstract.para: This dataset contains all species records held by LRERC recorded between 2015 and 2019 that we are able to share with the NBN Atlas. It is a collated dataset containing only verified data (Accepted - correct, Accepted - considered correct or Unconfirmed - plausible). Records have been collated from many sources including, but not limited to, LRERC's own survey work, County Recorders, members of the public, Ecology Consultants and local recording groups and schemes. Full record details are available by request directly from LRERC and may be subject to LRERCs standard charging policy.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial (CC-BY-NC) 4.0 License.

purpose.para: This is a collated dataset, added to the NBN to help with distribution information.

description.para: Various, it is a collated dataset. Further information may be available from LRERC by request.

The dataset only contains validated and verified data. It is a collation of data, some of which has been collected under structured surveys but most is ad hoc. Taxonomy is correct to the best of our ability but any concerns should be raised with LRERC for double-checking.

gbif.citation: Leicestershire and Rutland Environmental Records Centre (2021). Leicestershire and Rutland Environmental Records Centre records 2015-2019. Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/dues93 accessed via GBIF.org on 2022-02-08.
